items.name: Residential Service (Rate 7)
items.description: In all territory served by the Company.
items.source:
http://www.portlandgeneral.com/our_company/corporate_info/regulatory_documents/pdfs/schedules/sched_007.pdf

Adjustments applicable per the following tariff: http://www.portlandgeneral.com/our_company/corporate_info/regulatory_documents/pdfs/schedules/sched_100.pdf
items.basicinformationcomments: Adjustment does not include Spend fuel adjustment.
items.energycomments: Adjustments = Regional Power Act Exchange credit + Regulatory adjustments + Energy Efficiency Funding adjustment + Energy Efficiency Customer Service adjustment + Low Income Assistance + Renewable Resources Automatic Adjustment clause + Decoupling adjustment + Short-Term Transition adjustment + Customer-Owned Solar Payment Option Cost Recovery mechanism + Boardman Power Plant Decommissioning adjustment
